schema.description: Search conditions for the multi-waypoint route search.

startX.description: The X-coordinate for the starting point (origin) of the route search. It follows the coordinate system defined in the 'coordType' parameter.

startY.description: The Y-coordinate for the starting point (origin) of the route search. It follows the coordinate system defined in the 'coordType' parameter.

endX.description: The X-coordinate for the endpoint (destination) of the route search. It follows the coordinate system defined in the 'coordType' parameter.

endY.description: The Y-coordinate for the endpoint (destination) of the route search. It follows the coordinate system defined in the 'coordType' parameter.

option.description: Route search option. (Only one can be selected: real_traffic: Real-time Recommendation 1, real_traffic2: Real-time Recommendation 2, real_traffic_freeroad: Real-time Rec. + Free roads, short_distance_priority: Shortest distance, motorcycle: Motorcycle, recommendation: Recommended, highway_priority: Highway priority, personal_mobility: Optimized for Personal Mobility).

coordType.description: Specifies the coordinate system for all input coordinates (origin, destination, waypoints). 'wgs84' is the international standard coordinate system, and 'tw' is an internal Tinkware coordinate system. The default value is 'wgs84'.

viaList.description: A list (array) of waypoint information. Up to 100 waypoints can be set.

items.description: An object containing the coordinate information for a single waypoint.

viaX.description: The X-coordinate of the waypoint. It follows the coordinate system defined in the 'coordType' parameter.

viaY.description: The Y-coordinate of the waypoint. It follows the coordinate system defined in the 'coordType' parameter.

useAngle.description: Determines whether to use the departure angle in the search. If set to true, the 'angle' value is required. The default is false. (true: Prioritize driving direction, false: Do not prioritize driving direction).

angle.description: The departure angle of the vehicle, applied when 'useAngle' is true. It takes a value between 0 and 359 degrees, with 0 representing true north, increasing clockwise.

carType.description: Specifies the vehicle type for the route search. (1: Small car, 2: Medium car, 3: Large car, 4: Large truck, 5: Special truck, 6: Compact car). The default value is 1.

guideTop.description: The maximum number of major guidance points (Guide Points) to include in the route result. The default value is 5.

useGuide.description: Determines whether to include detailed turn-by-turn navigation information in the route result. The default value is false.

groupByTrafficColor.description: Determines whether to group the detailed path list (paths) by traffic color. The default value is false.

useTaxifare.description: Determines whether to retrieve the estimated taxi fare for the route. (0: Do not retrieve, 1: Standard taxi, 2: Deluxe taxi, 3: Both standard and deluxe). The default is 0.

useStartDirection.description: Determines whether to prioritize the vehicle's direction of travel at the start of the route search. The default is false. This can be useful when the precise 'angle' of the vehicle is unknown.

searchByAddress.description: Indicates whether to perform an address-based route search. The default value is false.

usageType.description: A type that distinguishes the usage purpose of the API service. (0: General, 1: Taxi). The default is 0.

carWeight.description: The total weight of the vehicle in kilograms (kg). This is applied when 'carType' is 4 (Large truck) or 5 (Special truck).

carHeight.description: The height of the vehicle in centimeters (cm). This is applied when 'carType' is 4 (Large truck) or 5 (Special truck).

avoidWaterSourceArea.description: Determines whether to avoid water source protection areas during the route search. The default is false.

avoidNarrowRoad.description: Sets the avoidance level for narrow roads (side streets). The value represents the number of round-trip lanes. Roads with this number of lanes or fewer will be avoided. (e.g., if the value is 6, roads with 6 or fewer round-trip lanes will be avoided). The default is 0.

avoidUTurn.description: Sets the avoidance level for U-turns. The value represents the number of round-trip lanes. U-turns on roads with this number of lanes or fewer will be avoided. (e.g., if the value is 6, U-turns on roads with 6 or fewer round-trip lanes will be avoided). The default is 0.

dem.description: Determines whether to include elevation (Digital Elevation Model) information for each point in the route result. The default is false.
